name: Vegetables ain't kiddin'
description:
Dear Potato,

Soon, you are going to have a rap battle against the carrot you saw last night.

I think I've trained you well enough, you are ready.

Remember, Click on the bubbles to choose a sentence, you'll need to click on 7 sentences per round.

The more hype you build, the higher the hype jauge, and when the hype jauge is filled up, you win a point, and a green cross appears.

If you get 3 green cross, you win.

I know I must have told you the rules about 100 times, but i want to be sure that you know what to do when you will be in front of that goddamn carrot.

Sincerely, your rap teacher (and also your Mom, i love you).
